valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 9 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 10 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Rockall 1002 losing its identity. New lows expected Rockall 986 and just west of Bailey 985 by midday tomorrow
